due to the community college, financially classes are extremely affordable
workout facility, theater, music, arts, ceramics, library, intramural sports, clubs and organizations, many opportunities to get involved.
offer subway upstairs in the student services building. great food.
great academic scale, the ability to transfer from this school is high, students are very well prepared for the transition.
attend registration early, due to a lot of prospective students looking to apply. class availability is slim.

Brookhaven is a great community college to attend, the resources available allow the diverse population of students to benefit and succeed each semester. Teachers are very helpful and committed to creating a great learning environment.

textAfterTable: Login to rate or flag the reviews Nathan from Ponder, TX 10/21/2011 Reviewer is A current student here. 3 of 28 Categories Comments Great for these types of students My family is a single parent household and we aren't rich. this is the perfect place for me and the website is perfect for my mom cause she can check on stuff too. That gives her some peace of mind and i like that... Tips for prospective students Jump in with both feet!!!! This is a great college !!! Traffic can be a challenge but take your time leave early and enjoy the ride!!! Bang for the buck The experience weighed against the cost of tuition... Wow! i am so glad I chose this school instead of the more expensive one. this is truely the right choice. Am enjoying being here This is a great campus and I love going to class.
